title: Queue dodge problem with ranked
body:
Not sure if this is beta client specific or not... but I have had 2 times (one for each preseason patch) where leaving ranked queue (before a match has been found... ie not in champ select and not failing to press the accept match button) has resulted in a queue dodge penalty (both 3LP and 6min timeout).

RIP 6LP {{item:3157}}   ... not that much of an issue... but the time out is annoying {{summoner:3}} .

Have already submitted a bug report through the client and started a support {{champion:89}}  ticket.

Just thought I'd share... and see if anyone else has had similar issues.

replies.body: Can't say it's an issue I've seen before so support is your best bet for this one :)
